entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
